definition: to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
(I'll) teach you a lesson/put you in your place
pinyin: gei3 ni3 dian3 yan2 se4 kan4 kan5

sentences.english: Look at these coasters over here.
If you don't like the weather at front window, see the weather at back window. (
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜歡前窗的天氣，不妨看看後窗的。

sentences.english: No thanks, I would rather go somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 那就算了，我再去別的地方看看吧。

sentences.english: You should look at that house before you decide to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 你應該看看那棟房子再決定購買。

sentences.english: Let me send you our catalog in English.
sentences.chinese: 請拿一本圖書目錄給我看看。

sentences.english: Go see it-I guarantee it'll knock your socks off!
sentences.chinese: 你得去看看，保證會讓你激動萬分的。

sentences.english: Now, to get to the number of neutrons, what we do is go up here to the upper left.
sentences.chinese: 現在，看看中子數，我們要做的，是看到這左上方。

sentences.english: Try to see what they see.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試看看他們所看到的。

sentences.english: Well, first of all, let's look at the Lewis structure.
sentences.chinese: 好，首先，我們看看它的路易斯結構。

sentences.english: See if you can employ your time in a better manner.
sentences.chinese: 看看你是否能夠以更好的方式使用時間。

sentences.english: Let's go to see the castle.
sentences.chinese: 康輝旅行社我們去看看那座城堡吧。

sentences.english: These look to be Hermes only.
For example, think of a Frisbee.
sentences.chinese: 舉個例子，就看看飛盤吧。

sentences.english: Come here. Let me show you some.
sentences.chinese: 到這邊來，我拿幾條給你看看。

sentences.english: I'd love to send a probe in there to find out what's really going on.
sentences.chinese: 我很想送一個探測器去那裏，看看到底發生了什麼。

sentences.english: And what do those visiting Karneval dress up as? Everything imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 看看這些科隆狂歡節參與者的打扮，發揮你的想象吧。

definition: to have a look
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
(onom.) smack!
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
to say sth

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
woolen material
to boil noodles

to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
(before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
there is no harm in/might as well
to make an inventory/to take stock
